summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous relevant resolutions and resolution 1483 (2003), 
Decides to establish a Committee of the Security Council with immediate effect, 
comprised of all Council members, to identify individuals and entities referred to in 
paragraph 19 of resolution 1483 (2003), and report on its work. 
The Committee will use guidelines and definitions previously agreed, which can be 
amended. 
The mandate of the Committee will be kept under review, including possible 
authorization to observe Member States' fulfilment of their obligations. 
The Council decides to remain seized of the matter.
